text:
RELIGION

Sath Sangh, Kailasapuram : Radha kalyana mahotsavam, Ganapathy homam, BHEL Township, 5 a.m.; sampradaya bhajan, 7 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Varasidhi Sri Anjaneyar Sannidhi, South Chithra Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.; Veera Sanjeevi Anjaneyar Sannidhi, West Gate, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, 28, II Street, SMESC Colony North East Extension, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Ranga Vittala Bhajan Mandali : Sri Purandaradasar aradhana, vocal concert by Kashyap Mahesh and party, Sri Vyasaraja Mutt, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

National Association of Geographers, India and Bharathidasan University Department of Geography: International conference on Future earth perspectives in South Asia, V.K.Srivastava, president, NAGI, inaugurates, V.M.Muthukumar, Vice Chancellor, presides, university campus, 10.30 a.m.

Bharathidasan University Constituent Arts and Science College and Institute of Entrepreneurship and Career Development, Bharathidasan University: Motivational campaign on promotion of youth entrepreneurship, S.Neelakanda Sharma, branch head, UCO Bank, TN Law School campus, inaugurates, college campus, Navalurkuttapattu, 10 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Institute of Technology, Samayapuram: Inauguration of Mechanical Engineering Students Technical Association, P.R.Ramanathan, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

Bharathidasan University Department of Social Work, Shrimati Indira Gandhi College and Srimad Andavan Arts and Science College: International seminar on’At risk sections of society,’ A.Chockanathan, former professor, Sri Ramakrishna Mission Vidhyalaya, inaugurates, university Khajamalai campus, 10 a.m.

Seethalakshmi Ramaswami College Department of Commerce: B.Komala, Head, Department of Economics, SRC, speaks on Communication revolution, 2 p.m.

St. Joseph’s College School of Management Studies and Department of Economics : Seminar on Foreign direct investment and its impact on Indian economy, K.Parthasarathy, Director, Institute of Entrepreneurship and Career Development, Bharathidasan University, inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.; Centre for Christian Research: Launching of website, annual day, book release and presentation of award, Rev.S.John Britto, Rector, presides, 11.30 a.m.

Jamal Mohamed College : Graduation Day of aided courses for men, A.K.Khaja Nazeemudeen, college correspondent, delivers graduation day address, 3 p.m.

Shrimati Indira Gandhi College : Release of ‘mega garment,’ 10 a.m.

MIET Arts and Science College : MIETY Expo – district level science exhibition, 10 a.m.; prize distribution, 4 p.m.

National Institute of Technology Department of Instrumentation and Control Engineering : ACODS - international conference on Advances in control and optimisation of dynamical systems, 9 a.m.

Bishop Heber College Department of English and South Asian English Language and Literature Teachers Association: International conference on English Language and Literature: Retrospects and Prospects, 9.30 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Handicrafts Development Corporation : Crafts Bazzar, Kailasapuram Club, BHEL, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation : North East crafts bazaar, SRT Hall, Thillai Nagar, 10 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Sri Vignesh Public School: Annual day, A.Kaliyamurthy, former Superintendent of police, chief guest, 4.30 p.m.

M.A.M.Group of School: Annual day, M.K.Muralitharan, Dean, K.A.P.Viswanatham Government Medical College, chief guest, 5 p.m.

Santhanam Vidyalaya : School day, S.Muthusamy, former principal, National College, chief guest, 5 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
